engChrName: There it is.
engSearchText: There it is.
jpnChrName: 見えてきたぜ、あれが《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》だ。
jpnSearchText: 見えてきたぜ、あれが《黒龍城砦（ヘイロンジャーイセン）》だ。

engChrName: This place is huge!
engSearchText: This place is huge!
jpnChrName: 思ったより大きいです……！
jpnSearchText: 思ったより大きいです……！

engChrName: Back in the day, thousands of miners lived here—
engSearchText: Back in the day, thousands of miners lived here—
jpnChrName: ああ、昔は何千人もの住人で 賑わってたらしいけどな──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、昔は何千人もの住人で
賑わってたらしいけどな──

engChrName: Is something wrong?
engSearchText: Is something wrong?
jpnChrName: ？　アーロンさん？
jpnSearchText: ？　アーロンさん？

engChrName: You still hurtin'?
engSearchText: You still hurtin'?
jpnChrName: どうした？
jpnSearchText: どうした？

engChrName: No. Don't mind me...
engSearchText: No. Don't mind me...
jpnChrName: いや、何でもねえ──
jpnSearchText: いや、何でもねえ──

engChrName: Fog!
engSearchText: Fog!

engChrName: And it appeared just as quickly as it did last night...
engSearchText: And it appeared just as quickly as it did last night...
jpnChrName: これは、昨日と同じ……！
jpnSearchText: これは、昨日と同じ……！

engChrName: I knew it.
engSearchText: I knew it.
jpnChrName: やっぱり……
jpnSearchText: やっぱり……

engChrName: And another reaction...
engSearchText: And another reaction...
jpnChrName: ……ゲネシスが………
jpnSearchText: ……ゲネシスが………

engChrName: Your purse glowed yesterday as well...
engSearchText: Your purse glowed yesterday as well...
jpnChrName: その光も昨日と……
jpnSearchText: その光も昨日と……

engChrName: So, anyone wanna explain to the class why it's lighting up like a lantern?
engSearchText:
So, anyone wanna explain to the class why it's
lighting up like a lantern?
jpnChrName: ハン……その小娘にも 何かあるみてぇじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……その小娘にも
何かあるみてぇじゃねえか？

engChrName: Sorry, but that's confidential. One thing's certain, though.
engSearchText:
Sorry, but that's confidential. One thing's
certain, though.
jpnChrName: 今は置いとけ。 それより間違いなくいるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
今は置いとけ。
それより間違いなくいるぞ。

engChrName: Almata's here. No doubt about it.
engSearchText: Almata's here. No doubt about it.
jpnChrName: 煌都を襲った災厄── 《アルマータ》の連中がな。
jpnSearchText:
煌都を襲った災厄──
《アルマータ》の連中がな。

engChrName: Then it's almost time for a good old-fashioned ass-kicking!
engSearchText:
Then it's almost time for a good old-fashioned
ass-kicking!
jpnChrName: ッ……上等だ！
jpnSearchText: ッ……上等だ！

engChrName: Don't be too hasty. We don't know what awaits us.
engSearchText: Don't be too hasty. We don't know what awaits us.
jpnChrName: 慎重に乗り込みましょう。
jpnSearchText: 慎重に乗り込みましょう。

engChrName: Huh. Another boat.
engSearchText: Huh. Another boat.
jpnChrName: このボートは……
jpnSearchText: このボートは……

engChrName: Do you think it belongs to Almata?
engSearchText: Do you think it belongs to Almata?
jpnChrName: ……アルマータが 使っているものでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……アルマータが
使っているものでしょうか？

engChrName: It's nearly identical to ours.
engSearchText: It's nearly identical to ours.
jpnChrName: 私たちが乗ってきたのと 同じタイプだけど……
jpnSearchText:
私たちが乗ってきたのと
同じタイプだけど……

engChrName: Wait a sec...
engSearchText: Wait a sec...
jpnChrName: ちょっと待て。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと待て。

engChrName: Yeah, this is definitely Shou's other boat.
engSearchText: Yeah, this is definitely Shou's other boat.
jpnChrName: ……間違いねえ、ショウの所で 使ってるもう一隻のボートだ。
jpnSearchText:
……間違いねえ、ショウの所で
使ってるもう一隻のボートだ。

engChrName: Don't tell me... Did that freakin' racer wander in here?
engSearchText:
Don't tell me... Did that freakin' racer wander
in here?
jpnChrName: あの馬鹿レーサーが……
jpnSearchText: あの馬鹿レーサーが……

engChrName: Oh, no...
engSearchText: Oh, no...
jpnChrName: マクシムさんたちが 乗っていたボートですか……
jpnSearchText:
マクシムさんたちが
乗っていたボートですか……

engChrName: Weren't they headed to that island...?
engSearchText: Weren't they headed to that island...?
jpnChrName: えと、海蝕洞に行ったのでは……？
jpnSearchText: えと、海蝕洞に行ったのでは……？

engChrName: We saw them sailing away from the island, but I thought they were going back to Langport...
engSearchText:
We saw them sailing away from the island, but I
thought they were going back to Langport...
jpnChrName: そういえば、海蝕洞からは 引き返していたようでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、海蝕洞からは
引き返していたようでしたが……

engChrName: Then they're either lost or stupid enough to come on purpose.
engSearchText:
Then they're either lost or stupid enough to come
on purpose.
jpnChrName: 迷ってこっちに来たのか、 調子に乗って足を延ばしたか。
jpnSearchText:
迷ってこっちに来たのか、
調子に乗って足を延ばしたか。

engChrName: Either way, this just got even worse.
engSearchText: Either way, this just got even worse.
jpnChrName: ハッ、どっちにせよ最悪だな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、どっちにせよ最悪だな。

engChrName: I don't fully follow, but I gather some civilians found their way here?
engSearchText:
I don't fully follow, but I gather some civilians found
their way here?
jpnChrName: 状況がよく分からないのだけど 民間人がボートに乗ってここに来た……
jpnSearchText:
状況がよく分からないのだけど
民間人がボートに乗ってここに来た……

engChrName: And what's more, they're completely unaware of the danger within?
engSearchText:
And what's more, they're completely unaware of the
danger within?
jpnChrName: そういう認識で合っているかしら？
jpnSearchText: そういう認識で合っているかしら？

engChrName: Seems like it.
engSearchText: Seems like it.
jpnChrName: 多分な。
jpnSearchText: 多分な。

engChrName: I dunno exactly what's up, but let's keep our eyes out for 'em.
engSearchText:
I dunno exactly what's up, but let's keep our eyes out
for 'em.
jpnChrName: まだヤツらと決まったわけじゃないが 一応注意しながら中に入るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まだヤツらと決まったわけじゃないが
一応注意しながら中に入るぞ。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）。
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）。

engChrName: I hope they're all right...
engSearchText: I hope they're all right...
jpnChrName: 無事だといいんですけど……
jpnSearchText: 無事だといいんですけど……

engChrName: Elaine has temporarily joined the party as a guest.
engSearchText: Elaine has temporarily joined the party as a guest.
jpnChrName: エレインがゲストとして一時的に加入しました。
jpnSearchText: <C1>エレインがゲストとして一時的に加入しました。

engChrName: Come on, guys! Surely we can talk this out!
engSearchText: Come on, guys! Surely we can talk this out!
jpnChrName: き、君たち！ この僕が誰だと思っている！？
jpnSearchText:
き、君たち！
この僕が誰だと思っている！？

engChrName: After all, I am Maxim Lugan, the world's famous Red Comet!
engSearchText:
After all, I am Maxim Lugan, the world's famous
Red Comet!
jpnChrName: 《紅い流星》マクシム・ルーガンに もしものことがあったら！
jpnSearchText:
《紅い流星》マクシム・ルーガンに
もしものことがあったら！

engChrName: Killing me would be a slight to all of racing—no, for all of humani...ty—
engSearchText:
Killing me would be a slight to all of racing—no, for
all of humani...ty—
jpnChrName: カーレース界の、いや全人類の損失──
jpnSearchText: カーレース界の、いや全人類の損失──

engChrName: Aidios, save me!
engSearchText: Aidios, save me!
jpnChrName: うおおおっ、話を聞きたまえっ！？
jpnSearchText: うおおおっ、話を聞きたまえっ！？

engChrName: Get a load of this guy.
engSearchText: Get a load of this guy.
jpnChrName: ……意外と元気そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……意外と元気そうだな。

engChrName: He's got the reflexes of a racer, all right.
engSearchText: He's got the reflexes of a racer, all right.
jpnChrName: 腐ってもトップレーサー、 いい反射神経してるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
腐ってもトップレーサー、
いい反射神経してるぜ。

engChrName: With those skills, maybe he can escape on his own.
engSearchText: With those skills, maybe he can escape on his own.
jpnChrName: はい、放っておいても 包囲を突破できそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、放っておいても
包囲を突破できそうですね。

engChrName: W-We can't just leave him here!
engSearchText: W-We can't just leave him here!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなことを 言ってる場合じゃないですよ！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなことを
言ってる場合じゃないですよ！

engChrName: Agreed. Let's move in to assist.
engSearchText: Agreed. Let's move in to assist.
jpnChrName: ええ──行くわよ！
jpnSearchText: ええ──行くわよ！

engChrName: How's it hangin', hot shot?
engSearchText: How's it hangin', hot shot?
jpnChrName: マクシム・ルーガン！
jpnSearchText: マクシム・ルーガン！

engChrName: What are you all doing here? Have you come to rescue me?
engSearchText:
What are you all doing here? Have you come to
rescue me?
jpnChrName: き、君たち……！ 助けに来てくれたのかい！？
jpnSearchText:
き、君たち……！
助けに来てくれたのかい！？

engChrName: Maybe. How about you lure those guys into a line for me real quick-like?
engSearchText:
Maybe. How about you lure those guys into a line for
me real quick-like?
jpnChrName: そのまま引きつけてこっちに来な！ 一気に叩くからよ！
jpnSearchText:
そのまま引きつけてこっちに来な！
一気に叩くからよ！

engChrName: You're using me as bait?!
engSearchText: You're using me as bait?!
jpnChrName: まさかの囮扱い！？
jpnSearchText: まさかの囮扱い！？

engChrName: I'm just messin' with you—but you better hurry. That one on the left is gainin' on you.
engSearchText:
I'm just messin' with you—but you better hurry.
That one on the left is gainin' on you.
jpnChrName: 冗談だ── って、左に一体漏れてんぞ！
jpnSearchText:
冗談だ──
って、左に一体漏れてんぞ！

engChrName: Are you joking or not?!
engSearchText: Are you joking or not?!
jpnChrName: 全然、冗談に聞こえないんだが！？
jpnSearchText: 全然、冗談に聞こえないんだが！？

engChrName: (Van's still doing this...?)
engSearchText: (Van's still doing this...?)
jpnChrName: （ふう、相変わらずね……）
jpnSearchText: （ふう、相変わらずね……）

engChrName: (I guess some things never change.)
engSearchText: (I guess some things never change.)
jpnChrName: （あはは……）
jpnSearchText: （あはは……）

engChrName: Let's kick some metallic ass!
engSearchText: Let's kick some metallic ass!
jpnChrName: ハッ、来やがったな──！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、来やがったな──！

engChrName: Engaging hostiles!
engSearchText: Engaging hostiles!
jpnChrName: 敵人形兵器多数── 殲滅を開始します！
jpnSearchText:
敵人形兵器多数──
殲滅を開始します！

engChrName: I have some choice words for you, but I'll put them aside. You did save me, after all.
engSearchText:
I have some choice words for you, but I'll put
them aside. You did save me, after all.
jpnChrName: ふう、言いたい事は山ほどあるが 本当に助かったよ……君たち。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、言いたい事は山ほどあるが
本当に助かったよ……君たち。

engChrName: It was unwise of you to trespass into a restricted area.
engSearchText: It was unwise of you to trespass into a restricted area.
jpnChrName: 立入禁止となっているこの施設に 入ってしまった是非はともかく……
jpnSearchText:
立入禁止となっているこの施設に
入ってしまった是非はともかく……

engChrName: Still, I'm glad to see you're all right.
engSearchText: Still, I'm glad to see you're all right.
jpnChrName: とりあえず無事で何よりです。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず無事で何よりです。

engChrName: Do my eyes deceive me? Aren't you Elaine Auclair?!
engSearchText: Do my eyes deceive me? Aren't you Elaine Auclair?!
jpnChrName: って、暗くて気付かなかったけど…… もしかしてエレイン・オークレール君！？
jpnSearchText:
って、暗くて気付かなかったけど……
もしかしてエレイン・オークレール君！？

engChrName: Well, yes.
engSearchText: Well, yes.
jpnChrName: ええ、まあ……
jpnSearchText: ええ、まあ……

engChrName: What a fascinating twist of fate it is that we would finally meet like this!
engSearchText:
What a fascinating twist of fate it is that we would
finally meet like this!
jpnChrName: 何という運命の悪戯！ まさか噂のヒロインと出会えるとはっ！
jpnSearchText:
何という運命の悪戯！
まさか噂のヒロインと出会えるとはっ！

engChrName: Say, have you read that all the gossip magazines voted us the top celebrity couple in the making?
engSearchText:
Say, have you read that all the gossip magazines voted
us the top celebrity couple in the making?
jpnChrName: 知ってるかい、某芸能誌の結婚したいランキングで 僕と君がそれぞれ男女で一位を──
jpnSearchText:
知ってるかい、某芸能誌の結婚したいランキングで
僕と君がそれぞれ男女で一位を──

engChrName: *sigh* Is this really the time?
engSearchText: *sigh* Is this really the time?
jpnChrName: ……ふう。 そんな場合ですか、ルーガンさん？
jpnSearchText:
……ふう。
そんな場合ですか、ルーガンさん？

engChrName: ...No, I suppose not.
engSearchText: ...No, I suppose not.
jpnChrName: ………ハイ、ソウデスネ。
jpnSearchText: ………ハイ、ソウデスネ。

engChrName: (This guy, I swear...)
engSearchText: (This guy, I swear...)
jpnChrName: （サイテー……）
jpnSearchText: （サイテー……）

engChrName: (I feel dumb for being impressed when he bought us time to escape earlier.)
engSearchText:
(I feel dumb for being impressed when he bought us
time to escape earlier.)
jpnChrName: （さっき逃がしてくれた時は   格好良かったのに……）
jpnSearchText:
（さっき逃がしてくれた時は
格好良かったのに……）

engChrName: (I guess whatever respect he earned is gone now.)
engSearchText: (I guess whatever respect he earned is gone now.)
jpnChrName: （せっかく上がった評価も   大暴落みたいです……）
jpnSearchText:
（せっかく上がった評価も
大暴落みたいです……）

engChrName: (W-Well, at least he lived to try to be better...eventually.)
engSearchText:
(W-Well, at least he lived to try to be
better...eventually.)
jpnChrName: （ま、まあ無事で良かったかと……）
jpnSearchText: （ま、まあ無事で良かったかと……）

engChrName: Urgh...
engSearchText: Urgh...
jpnChrName: くっ……
jpnSearchText: くっ……

engChrName: You sure you're okay? Could always hitch a ride back with these guys.
engSearchText:
You sure you're okay? Could always hitch a ride back
with these guys.
jpnChrName: おい、本当に大丈夫か？ 何ならお前はレーサーたちと──
jpnSearchText:
おい、本当に大丈夫か？
何ならお前はレーサーたちと──

engChrName: How many times do I have to tell you I'm fine? You're so freaking nosy.
engSearchText:
How many times do I have to tell you I'm fine?
You're so freaking nosy.
jpnChrName: るせえ……大丈夫ってんだろ！ さっきから漲（みなぎ）りまくってんだからよ！
jpnSearchText:
るせえ……大丈夫ってんだろ！
さっきから漲（みなぎ）りまくってんだからよ！

engChrName: Let's just focus on—
engSearchText: Let's just focus on—
jpnChrName: それよりコイツらはここから外へ──
jpnSearchText: それよりコイツらはここから外へ──

engChrName: Oh? Aren't we the perceptive one? And here I thought I'd hidden myself pretty well.
engSearchText:
Oh? Aren't we the perceptive one? And here I
thought I'd hidden myself pretty well.
jpnChrName: へえ、なかなか鋭いじゃない♪ 気配は消してたつもりなんだけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、なかなか鋭いじゃない♪
気配は消してたつもりなんだけどなぁ。

engChrName: I-It's him...!
engSearchText: I-It's him...!
jpnChrName: ！　あの人は……！
jpnSearchText: ！　あの人は……！

engChrName: The man we met in Creil.
engSearchText: The man we met in Creil.
jpnChrName: クレイユ村で現れた……
jpnSearchText: クレイユ村で現れた……

engChrName: You're just about the last person I wanted to run into here.
engSearchText:
You're just about the last person I wanted to run
into here.
jpnChrName: またヤバいのが現れやがったな……
jpnSearchText: またヤバいのが現れやがったな……

engChrName: Gotta say, though, surprised to see you in one piece after the Direwolf went after you.
engSearchText:
Gotta say, though, surprised to see you in one piece
after the Direwolf went after you.
jpnChrName: まさか《痩せ狼》に追われて 無事だったとは思わなかったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まさか《痩せ狼》に追われて
無事だったとは思わなかったぜ。

engChrName: His persistence was nothing to scoff at, believe you me.
engSearchText:
His persistence was nothing to scoff at, believe
you me.
jpnChrName: フフ、しつこいオジサンだったから 振り切るのは大変だったけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、しつこいオジサンだったから
振り切るのは大変だったけどねぇ。

engChrName: After I shook him off, I figured I'd check in on my darling comrades.
engSearchText:
After I shook him off, I figured I'd check in on my
darling comrades.
jpnChrName: やっと撒けたからヴィオーラたちが 仕切ってたこちらを覗きにきたのさ。
jpnSearchText:
やっと撒けたからヴィオーラたちが
仕切ってたこちらを覗きにきたのさ。

engChrName: And I have to admit, they've put together a compelling production, don't you think?
engSearchText:
And I have to admit, they've put together a
compelling production, don't you think?
jpnChrName: ウフフ…… 面白いことになってるじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ……
面白いことになってるじゃない？

engChrName: Please clear the area.
engSearchText: Please clear the area.
jpnChrName: ……貴方たちは下がってください。
jpnSearchText: ……貴方たちは下がってください。

engChrName: R-Right.
engSearchText: R-Right.
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……
jpnSearchText: あ、ああ……

engChrName: You're the one who killed Aida!
engSearchText: You're the one who killed Aida!
jpnChrName: クレイユ村に現れた…… ……アイーダさんの仇ッ……！
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村に現れた……
……アイーダさんの仇ッ……！

engChrName: Oh, the little one's here as well. Congrats on the career change, by the way.
engSearchText:
Oh, the little one's here as well. Congrats on the
career change, by the way.
jpnChrName: ああ、君もいたんだ？ 裏解決屋とやらに就職したのかい？
jpnSearchText:
ああ、君もいたんだ？
裏解決屋とやらに就職したのかい？

engChrName: War is such a fickle business, after all. An ally today could be an undead you have to strike down tomorrow. ❤
engSearchText:
War is such a fickle business, after all. An ally today
could be an undead you have to strike
down tomorrow. ❤
jpnChrName: うんうん、若いうちは色々経験して 人生の彩りを増やすのは大切だ❤
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、若いうちは色々経験して
人生の彩りを増やすのは大切だ❤

engChrName: Y-You shut your mouth!
engSearchText: Y-You shut your mouth!
jpnChrName: っ……ふざけないで……！
jpnSearchText: っ……ふざけないで……！

engChrName: What's up with Minty Fresh here?
engSearchText: What's up with Minty Fresh here?
jpnChrName: なんだァ、このムカつく野郎は。
jpnSearchText: なんだァ、このムカつく野郎は。

engChrName: He's like Viola and Alexandre from before.
engSearchText: He's like Viola and Alexandre from before.
jpnChrName: ……アルマータの幹部の一人です。
jpnSearchText: ……アルマータの幹部の一人です。

engChrName: Silly me. I haven't introduced myself to the new arrivals.
engSearchText:
Silly me. I haven't introduced myself to the
new arrivals.
jpnChrName: ウフフ…… お初の人もいるし改めて名乗ろうかな？
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ……
お初の人もいるし改めて名乗ろうかな？

engChrName: I'm one of Almata's three executives—the deadly yet beautiful Melchior of the Thorns!
engSearchText:
I'm one of Almata's three executives—the deadly yet
beautiful Melchior of the Thorns!
jpnChrName: アルマータの三幹部の一人、 《棘（ソーン）》のメルキオルって薄幸の美青年さ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの三幹部の一人、
《棘（ソーン）》のメルキオルって薄幸の美青年さ。

engChrName: Don't feel the need to return the introductions, though. Your reputations precede you both.
engSearchText:
Don't feel the need to return the introductions,
though. Your reputations precede you both.
jpnChrName: 《剣の乙女》さんに《小覇王》君も、 どうかお見知りおきを♪
jpnSearchText:
《剣の乙女》さんに《小覇王》君も、
どうかお見知りおきを♪

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: っ……てめえ……
jpnSearchText: っ……てめえ……

engChrName: So...it really is you.
engSearchText: So...it really is you.
jpnChrName: 《棘（ソーン）》……まさか。
jpnSearchText: 《棘（ソーン）》……まさか。

engChrName: I know I said earlier that I'd only dropped by to check in on my fellow executives...
engSearchText:
I know I said earlier that I'd only dropped by to check
in on my fellow executives...
jpnChrName: 言ったように、今回は二人の仕切りを 覗きにきただけだから見逃してもいいけど──
jpnSearchText:
言ったように、今回は二人の仕切りを
覗きにきただけだから見逃してもいいけど──

engChrName: ...but since that big bad wolf chased me away from our last fight, I've been pent up something fierce.
engSearchText:
...but since that big bad wolf chased me away from
our last fight, I've been pent up something fierce.
jpnChrName: 前も狼サンのせいで途中退場しちゃったし ちょっと欲求不満なんだよね……僕。
jpnSearchText:
前も狼サンのせいで途中退場しちゃったし
ちょっと欲求不満なんだよね……僕。

engChrName: Now, I'm faced by a stage set with such an enticing cast. How could I possibly resist?
engSearchText:
Now, I'm faced by a stage set with such an
enticing cast. How could I possibly resist?
jpnChrName: それに舞台とかもそうだけど ただ見てるだけなのはつまらないし❤
jpnSearchText:
それに舞台とかもそうだけど
ただ見てるだけなのはつまらないし❤

engChrName: Then, let's draw this curtain and get the show on the road.
engSearchText:
Then, let's draw this curtain and get the show on
the road.
jpnChrName: ハッ……気が合うじゃねえか。 華劇は舞ってこそナンボだしなァ……！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……気が合うじゃねえか。
華劇は舞ってこそナンボだしなァ……！

engChrName: Aida, please watch over me. I will avenge you!
engSearchText: Aida, please watch over me. I will avenge you!
jpnChrName: アイーダさんの仇…… ……この場で取らせてもらいますっ！
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんの仇……
……この場で取らせてもらいますっ！

engChrName: Oh, I can barely contain myself any longer, so...shall we dance?
engSearchText:
Oh, I can barely contain myself any longer, so...shall
we dance?
jpnChrName: うんうん、いい感じだ♪ それじゃあ味見させてもらおうかな──！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、いい感じだ♪
それじゃあ味見させてもらおうかな──！

engChrName: En garde!
engSearchText: En garde!
jpnChrName: 来るわ──！
jpnSearchText: 来るわ──！

engChrName: Give this all you've got! Hear me?!
engSearchText: Give this all you've got! Hear me?!
jpnChrName: 尋常じゃねえ相手だ、何とか凌げ！
jpnSearchText: 尋常じゃねえ相手だ、何とか凌げ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Tch...
engSearchText: Tch...
jpnChrName: 野郎ッ──！
jpnSearchText: 野郎ッ──！

engChrName: Oh, dear!
engSearchText: Oh, dear!
jpnChrName: おっとぉ！
jpnSearchText: おっとぉ！

engChrName: Bah!
engSearchText: Bah!
jpnChrName: チッ……！
jpnSearchText: チッ……！

engChrName: Elaine!
engSearchText: Elaine!
jpnChrName: エレイン！
jpnSearchText: エレイン！

engChrName: Hyaaa!
engSearchText: Hyaaa!
jpnChrName: はあああっ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>はあああっ！

engChrName: Hahaha! No wonder you put up a fight against the boss!
engSearchText:
Hahaha! No wonder you put up a fight against
the boss!
jpnChrName: あははははっ、流石やるねぇ！ ボスに食い下がっただけはある！
jpnSearchText:
あははははっ、流石やるねぇ！
ボスに食い下がっただけはある！

engChrName: So that WAS him!
engSearchText: So that WAS him!
jpnChrName: っ、やっぱり……
jpnSearchText: っ、やっぱり……

engChrName: Van! Go on ahead!
engSearchText: Van! Go on ahead!
jpnChrName: ──ヴァン、 貴方たちは先に行きなさい！
jpnSearchText:
──ヴァン、
貴方たちは先に行きなさい！

engChrName: I'll hold him here and allow the civilians to escape!
engSearchText: I'll hold him here and allow the civilians to escape!
jpnChrName: 相手をしながら何とか３人を逃がすわ！
jpnSearchText: 相手をしながら何とか３人を逃がすわ！

engChrName: All right! Come with me, guys!
engSearchText: All right! Come with me, guys!
jpnChrName: 分かった！ ──行くぞお前ら！
jpnSearchText:
分かった！
──行くぞお前ら！

engChrName: Please stay safe!
engSearchText: Please stay safe!
jpnChrName: エレインさん、どうかご無事で！
jpnSearchText: エレインさん、どうかご無事で！

engChrName: Sorry for leaving this all to you.
engSearchText: Sorry for leaving this all to you.
jpnChrName: ッ……不本意ですが お任せします……！
jpnSearchText:
ッ……不本意ですが
お任せします……！

engChrName: We owe you one!
engSearchText: We owe you one!
jpnChrName: ハッ──借りは返すぜ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ──借りは返すぜ！
………………………………

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnSearchText: ……チッ……………

engChrName: Golly! All that hard work, and elders live to be old another day!
engSearchText:
Golly! All that hard work, and elders live to be old
another day!
jpnChrName: あはは、残念だったね～。 折角あそこまで仕込んだのに❤
jpnSearchText:
あはは、残念だったね～。
折角あそこまで仕込んだのに❤

engChrName: Sure, we accomplished our real goal here, but I have a feeling the boss won't be too happy.
engSearchText:
Sure, we accomplished our real goal here, but I have a
feeling the boss won't be too happy.
jpnChrName: 本命の目的は果たせたけど ボスもガッカリするんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
本命の目的は果たせたけど
ボスもガッカリするんじゃない？

engChrName: A failure is a failure. The boss may respond as he sees fit.
engSearchText:
A failure is a failure. The boss may respond as
he sees fit.
jpnChrName: ──元よりこの身は死兵。 咎を受けるならば従うだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
──元よりこの身は死兵。
咎を受けるならば従うだけだ。

engChrName: Hey, Melchior! Don't think I've forgotten this is all your fault for screwing up in Creil!
engSearchText:
Hey, Melchior! Don't think I've forgotten this is all
your fault for screwing up in Creil!
jpnChrName: 人のことを言えんのかい、メルキオル！ アンタもクレイユでやり損ねたんだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
人のことを言えんのかい、メルキオル！
アンタもクレイユでやり損ねたんだろう！？

engChrName: Heheh. It is what it is. Though, I did stumble on an ideal venue in the process.
engSearchText:
Heheh. It is what it is. Though, I did stumble on an
ideal venue in the process.
jpnChrName: うふふ、まぁね。 代わりに良い“候補地”を見つけたけど。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、まぁね。
代わりに良い“候補地”を見つけたけど。

engChrName: In the meantime, we must focus. The next battle is fast approaching.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, we must focus. The next battle is
fast approaching.
jpnChrName: どのみち、いまだ前哨戦── 程なくして次の戦端も開かれよう。
jpnSearchText:
どのみち、いまだ前哨戦──
程なくして次の戦端も開かれよう。

engChrName: Ugh, don't remind me. I don't like having to work with those two.
engSearchText:
Ugh, don't remind me. I don't like having to work
with those two.
jpnChrName: そうだね……気にくわないが “あの２人”とも連携しておくか。
jpnSearchText:
そうだね……気にくわないが
“あの２人”とも連携しておくか。

engChrName: Be nice to your teammates, children! Even if they are a little cuckoo.
engSearchText:
Be nice to your teammates, children! Even if they are
a little cuckoo.
jpnChrName: うんうん、精々仲良くしてあげてよ。 どちらもちょっとイっちゃってるけどさ♪
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、精々仲良くしてあげてよ。
どちらもちょっとイっちゃってるけどさ♪

engChrName: It's rich for you of all people to be calling someone crazy.
engSearchText:
It's rich for you of all people to be calling
someone crazy.
jpnChrName: ハッ、アンタ以上に イってるヤツがいるわけないだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、アンタ以上に
イってるヤツがいるわけないだろ。

engChrName: If either of them fought at full strength, they could dispatch an entire army singlehandedly.
engSearchText:
If either of them fought at full strength, they could
dispatch an entire army singlehandedly.
jpnChrName: ……どちらも一軍に比する戦力。 使い所を見極める必要はありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……どちらも一軍に比する戦力。
使い所を見極める必要はありそうだ。

engChrName: Well, they'll have a chance to whip out those toys of theirs before too long.
engSearchText:
Well, they'll have a chance to whip out those toys of
theirs before too long.
jpnChrName: フフ、装置の件もあるけど それにしても続けてか……
jpnSearchText:
フフ、装置の件もあるけど
それにしても続けてか……

engChrName: Perhaps we'll even run into that spriggan again. It's almost like fate...
engSearchText:
Perhaps we'll even run into that spriggan again.
It's almost like fate...
jpnChrName: 《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》── どうやら“縁”があるみたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》──
どうやら“縁”があるみたいだね？

engChrName: No turnin' back now. We gotta settle this.
engSearchText: No turnin' back now. We gotta settle this.
jpnChrName: 引き返してる時間はねえ。 ここでケリをつけるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
引き返してる時間はねえ。
ここでケリをつけるぞ。

engChrName: Damn straight!
engSearchText: Damn straight!
jpnChrName: ハッ、ったりめーだ。 さっさと進もうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ったりめーだ。
さっさと進もうぜ。
